name: Earth 2999 Prototype
description:
Earth 2999 is a super early prototype for a android game i am looking at making in the near future where players can explore space and planets while surviving the needs of supplies and fuel for their ship, players are able to land on planets and mine, then return to space stations to sell good and buy necessities.

feel free to donate to help the development of the proper game.

the full game will include buy able ships, more tradable resources, random gen universe, first person in areas and much much more.

possible extras

Walk around ship and customize it

RPG system for characters

and more.
